title: The Matrix Quiz
summary: Browser-based quiz that challenges Matrix trilogy fans with instant scoring and themed feedback.
problem: Film fans wanted a quick way to test their Matrix knowledge without downloading an app or dealing with intrusive ads.
approach: Designed a lightweight single-page quiz with semantic HTML, custom CSS styling, and jQuery-driven state management to handle scoring, validation, and result messaging. The experience works offline-friendly thanks to minimal assets and loads instantly on GitHub Pages.
results: Delivers a complete quiz loop in under two minutes of play time
Maintains full keyboard navigation and aria-live scoring updates
Reusable question data structure enables easy expansion
